definition: Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Xian is the capital of Shaanxi province, located in the southern part of the Guanzhong Plain.
sentences.chinese: 西安是陝西省的首府，位於關中平原南部位置。

sentences.english: Xi'an is one of the four major ancient civilization capitals, locating in the center of Guanzhong Plain.
sentences.chinese: 西安位於關中平原中部，是世界著名的文化古都之一。
